User Story: As a Guest/User, I want to Sign In (Email/Password), so that I can use the system effectively.
Description: Users need to access their account to use personalized features.
Solution: Implement Login API (JWT), validate credentials, handle errors (401), store token in client.

User Story: As a Guest/User, I want to Sign In (OAuth - Google), so that I can use the system effectively.
Description: Users need to access their account to use personalized features.
Solution: Implement Login API (JWT), validate credentials, handle errors (401), store token in client.

User Story: As a Guest/User, I want to Reset Password, so that I can use the system effectively.
Description: Users may forget passwords and need recovery options.
Solution: Implement Forgot Password flow (Email OTP/Link), verify OTP, allow password update.

User Story: As a Guest/User, I want to Log out, so that I can use the system effectively.
Description: Users need to securely end their session.
Solution: Clear client-side LocalStorage/Cookies, optionally blacklist token on server.

User Story: As a Authenticated User, I want to Adjust User Profile, so that I can use the system effectively.
Description: Users want to customize their online persona.
Solution: UpdateProfile API, handle avatar upload, update DB columns.

User Story: As a Guest/User, I want to Create User Profile (Sign up), so that add new content.
Description: New users need to create an account to join the platform.
Solution: Implement Registration API, validate input (email/pass strength), hash password, create User record.

User Story: As a Authenticated User, I want to Update User Profile (Avatar, Bio, Cover Photo), so that I can use the system effectively.
Description: Users want to customize their online persona.
Solution: UpdateProfile API, handle avatar upload, update DB columns.

User Story: As a Authenticated User, I want to Delete User Profile, so that I can use the system effectively.
As a Authenticated User, I want to Search User Profile, so that I can use the system effectively.
Description: Users want to find other people.
Solution: Search User API by name/email.

User Story: As a Authenticated User, I want to View Other User Profile, so that access information.
Description: Users want to see their own or others' information.
Solution: GetProfile API, return DTO with follower counts, bio, avatar.

User Story: As a Authenticated User, I want to Manage privacy settings, so that keep data organized.
Description: Users want to control who sees their content.
Solution: Update PrivacySettings column (JSON/Fields) in User table.

User Story: As a Authenticated User, I want to Adjust Post, so that I can use the system effectively.
As a Authenticated User, I want to Create Post, so that add new content.
Description: Users want to share moments with text, images, or video.
Solution: Create Post API (Multipart/Form-data), upload media to Cloudinary, save metadata to DB.

User Story: As a Authenticated User, I want to Update Post, so that I can use the system effectively.
Description: Users want to correct or modify their published content.
Solution: Update Post API, validate ownership, update DB records.

User Story: As a Authenticated User, I want to Delete Post, so that I can use the system effectively.
Description: Users want to remove content they no longer want shared.
Solution: Soft-delete Post API (IsDeleted=1), remove from feeds.

User Story: As a Authenticated User, I want to Search Post, so that I can use the system effectively.
Description: Users want to find specific content using keywords or semantic meaning.
Solution: Integrate Vector Search (Qdrant) or Text Search (Postgres ILIKE), return ranked results.

User Story: As a Authenticated User, I want to View Post NewsFeed, so that access information.
Description: Users want to see updates from friends or trending content.
Solution: Implement GetNewsfeed/GetExplore APIs with pagination (cursor-based), filter by privacy.

User Story: As a Authenticated User, I want to View Explore Feed, so that access information.
Description: Allow Authenticated User to perform View Explore Feed to achieve their goals.
Solution: Implement corresponding Frontend UI and Backend API Controller methods.

User Story: As a Authenticated User, I want to Share Post, so that I can use the system effectively.
As a Authenticated User, I want to Hide Post, so that I can use the system effectively.
Description: Users want to hide specific post.
Solution: Add to HiddenPosts table, exclude from query.

User Story: As a Authenticated User, I want to Restore Post, so that I can use the system effectively.
Description: Users want to archive specific post.
Solution: Toggle IsArchived flag.

User Story: As a Authenticated User, I want to Archive Post, so that I can use the system effectively.
Description: Users want to archive specific post.
Solution: Toggle IsArchived flag.

User Story: As a Authenticated User, I want to Unarchived Post, so that I can use the system effectively.
Description: Users want to archive specific post.
Solution: Toggle IsArchived flag.

User Story: As a Authenticated User, I want to React to Post, so that I can use the system effectively.
Description: Users want to express emotions on content.
Solution: Toggle Reaction API, update counts, send notification to owner.
